title: Looking for a team (rank gold)
body:
Hi, I'm looking for a team. My prefered role is mid, followed by botlane (supp/ad doesn't matter). Current rank is G2
The team should focus on improving and working on team strats while having fun with each other. Got a working headset and enough time. I speak english and german.
Feel free to pick me up ^^
Everyone have a nice day  \°-°/
